attributes.action: confirm that there is shortly to be a reduction in the amount of national insurance employees have to pay because they have been pushed to the back of the queue for medical treatment at primary care in the National (But Indigenous Taxpayers Are Low Priority) Health Service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
